document.full_text: with time running short, president barack obama failed on tuesday to break a deadlock in budget talks between his democrats and republicans that threatens a partial shutdown of the u.s. government.
document.title: government shutdown looms despite obama's intervention
lines_and_colors: with time running short, president barack obama failed on tuesday to break a deadlock in budget talks between his democrats and republicans that threatens a partial shutdown of the u.s. government.
